chapters.title: Chapter 16: The Subject of Negotiations
chapters.info: Mistress of Novices, p. 396 (476)—The Aes Sedai who is in charge of training novices and Accepted in the White Tower. The post was held by Sheriam Bayanar of the Blue Ajah until a coup that deposed Siuan Sanche chased her out of the Tower. The post is now held by Silviana Brehon in Tar Valon and Tiana Noselle among the Aes Sedai who fled to Salidar. Another Mistress of Novices in the past was Sereille Bagand, who later became the Amyrlin Seat. See also Bagand, Sereille; Bayanar, Sheriam; Brehon, Silviana; Noselle, Tiana.
